scripts.build:chrome: PLATFORM=chrome gulp clean && PLATFORM=chrome gulp build
scripts.build:firefox: PLATFORM=firefox gulp clean && PLATFORM=firefox gulp build
scripts.build: npm run build:chrome && npm run build:firefox
scripts.publish:chrome: npm run build:chrome && webstore upload --source dist/build/chrome --auto-publish
scripts.publish:firefox: npm run build:firefox && cd dist/build/firefox && web-ext-submit
